question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. guitar
B. red pickup truck
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The guitar is being held by a person standing in the middle ground, while the red pickup truck is parked closer to the foreground, making the guitar appear further away from the camera.
